info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 14 at 10:18AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida...
Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72 affecting DeSoto County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Horse Creek near Arcadia at SR 72.
* WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Buildings in Hidden Acres flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to 14.0 feet Thursday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.0 feet on 09/07/1959. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued by 11pmlate tonight by 130 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
